items.name: dockerfile
items.description: You can't make a container without a Dockerfile! Get 1 more contianer per click.

items.name: dockerRunCommand
items.description: A Docker Run command lets you run a single container easily. Get 5 more containers per click.

items.name: dockerComposeFile
items.description: A Docker Compose file helps you manage multi-container deployments. Get 30 more containers per click

items.name: raspberryPiZero2W
items.description: The Raspberry Pi Zero 2W is a tiny, and extremely affordable (only $15!) computer that you can use to run Docker. Get 20 containers per second.

items.name: raspberryPi4
items.description: The Raspberry Pi 4 is a powerful single board computer (sbc) that can be great as a home server. Get 150 containers per second.

items.name: zimaBoard
items.description: The ZimaBoard is another SBC that is designed to be a home server. It was meant to be the prize for Dockerize, but it was sold out during fulfilment. Get 400 containers per second.

items.name: dockerSwarm
items.description: Docker Swarm is a system for managing clusters of machines to deploy containers. Get 500 more containers per click.
